verses.hausa: Alfahari da yawan dũkiya da dangi ya shagaltar da ku (dagaibada mai amfaninku).

verses.english: No! You are going to know.
Then no! You are going to know.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, tabbas, zã ku sani.

verses.english: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
verses.hausa: Haƙĩƙa, da kuna da sani sani na yaƙĩni.

verses.english: You will surely see the Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne da kuna ganin Jahĩm.

verses.english: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan lalle ne za ku gan ta, da idanu, bayyane.

verses.english: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan lalle ne za a tambaye ku, a rãnar nan lãbãrin ni'imar (da aka yi muku).
